tags.explanation: Mail servers receiving mail for this domain will report statistics for messages from this domain and will reject messages as spam (message wont reach recipient).
Policy (p) applies to 100 % of unauthorised mail for this domain.
Mail servers receiving mail for subdomains of this domain will report statistics for messages from subdomains.
Generate a forensic report if SPF or DKIM checks fail.
Aggregate reports should be sent every 86400 seconds (24 hours).
Forensic reports will be sent in AFRF (Authentication Failure Reporting Format) format.
SPF domain field must match any sub domain of the domain in  SMTP HELO / SMTP MAIL FROM.
DKIM domain field must match any sub domain of the domain in From: email header.

errors.message: The specified sub-domain policy (sp) is ineffective because digital.cabinet-office.gov.uk is not an organisational domain.
